messages.title: Labour delivers real improvement
messages.content: The new University College Hospital, Better schools for Camden, A better deal for families

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Frank made sure we got a new, state-of-the-art University College hospital.
Labour investment has improved Camden schools, with new premises, equipment, more teachers and better results.
Under Labour Camden has 17 Sure Start centres, giving children and families the start they deserve.

mentions.candidate: Frank Dobson is your Labour candidate for Holborn & St Pancras.

issues.education: Better schools for Camden - Labour investment has improved Camden schools.
issues.health: The new University College Hospital - As Health Secretary Frank made sure we got a new, state-of-the-art University College hospital.
issues.socialWelfare: A better deal for families - Under Labour Camden has 17 Sure Start centres.

leaflet.personalStatement: My pledges to you - I will fight for a better deal for local people, like a school south of Euston Road. I will stand up for you in parliament and in the community...

politicalExperience.achievements: Frank made sure we got a new, state-of-the-art University College hospital.

endorsements.endorsement: Frank Dobson has fought tirelessly for ordinary people for almost three decades. He's currently backing our campaign to keep the sale of the Crown Estate, to stay as social housing.

quotes.text: The man is a living legend in my book, no matter how long it takes.
